TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ServiceThrottle extends System.Object

summary.span: 控制服务的吞吐量以优化可用性和性能。

span.span: Controls the throughput of a service to optimize availability and performance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 以优化服务的性能特征。Use the to tune the performance characteristics of a service. 为服务配置 的最简单的方法是使用 ，特别是从应用程序配置文件。The easiest way to configure the for a service is to use the , especially from an application configuration file. 属性指定 对象中的所有调度程序对象的最大活动处理消息数。The property specifies the maximum number of messages actively processing across all the dispatcher objects in a object. 属性指定服务中 对象的最大数目。The property specifies the maximum number of objects in the service. 属性指定单个 可接受的最大会话数。The property specifies the maximum number of sessions a can accept. > [!NOTE] > 第一次调用时，会记录跟踪，且 或会话会被插入等待队列。A trace is written when the first call, , or session is queued on the waitlist. 第一个跟踪将记录为警告。The first trace is written as a warning. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过引用应用程序配置文件中的 ，演示了 的典型用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在这种情况下，对于一个到 的连接，指定的值一次最多只能建立一个消息处理。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 实际的用法必须根据经验确定。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentCalls { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxConcurrentCalls : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 中所有调度程序对象的最大活动处理消息数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of messages actively processing across all dispatcher objects in a .

value.span: 服务中活动消息的上限。

span.span: The upper limit of active messages in the service.

value.span: 默认值为 16 \* 计算机中的处理器数。

span.span: The default is 16 \* number of processors in the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 对象中的所有调度程序对象的最大活动处理消息数。The property specifies the maximum number of messages actively processing across all the dispatcher objects in a object. 每个通道都可以有一个挂起的消息，该消息在 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 开始处理之前，该消息不会计算的值。Each channel can have one pending message that does not count against the value of until Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) begins to process it. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值超出限制一次，就会记录一个跟踪。A trace is written every time the value of this property is exceeded. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过引用应用程序配置文件中的 ，演示了 的典型用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在这种情况下，对于一个到 的连接，指定的值一次最多只能建立一个消息处理。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 实际的用法必须根据经验确定。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentInstances { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxConcurrentInstances : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一次可执行的最大服务对象数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of service objects that can execute at one time.

value.span: 服务中一次可执行的最大 对象数。

span.span: The maximum number of objects in the service at one time.

value.span: 默认值等于最大并发调用数 + 最大并发会话数。

span.span: The default is Maximum Concurrent Calls + Maximum Concurrent Sessions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定服务中 对象的最大数目。The property specifies the maximum number of objects in the service. 牢记 属性和 属性之间的关系是很重要。It is important to keep in mind the relationship between the property and the property. 如果 为，则 结果值为会话总数。If is the resulting value is the total number of sessions. 如果 为 ，则结果值将为并发调用的数量。If is , the resulting value is the number of concurrent calls. 如果消息到达时， 对象的数目已经达到最大数量，则将保存该消息，直至有 对象关闭。If a message arrives while the maximum number of objects already exist, the message is held until an object closes. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值超出限制一次，就会记录一个跟踪。A trace is written every time the value of this property is exceeded. 第一个跟踪将记录为警告。The first trace is written as a warning. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过引用应用程序配置文件中的 ，演示了 的典型用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在这种情况下，对于一个到 的连接，指定的值一次最多只能建立一个消息处理。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 实际的用法必须根据经验确定。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxConcurrentSessions { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.MaxConcurrentSessions : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个指定 对象可一次接受的最大会话数的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the maximum number of sessions a object can accept at one time.

value.span: 服务主机可接受的最大会话数。

span.span: The maximum number of sessions a service host accepts.

value.span: 默认值为 100 \* 计算机中的处理器数。

span.span: The default is 100 \* number of processors in the computer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定 可接受的最大通道数。The property specifies the maximum number of channels a can accept. 每个侦听器对象都可以有一个挂起的通道，该通道不会计算的值， 除非 WCF 接受通道并开始处理消息。Each listener object can have one pending channel that does not count against the value of until WCF accepts the channel and begins processing messages on it. 在使用会话的方案中，此属性是最有用的。This property is most useful in scenarios that make use of sessions. > [!NOTE] > 此属性的值超出限制一次，就会记录一个跟踪。A trace is written every time the value of this property is exceeded. 第一个跟踪将记录为警告。The first trace is written as a warning. 有关会话的详细信息，请参阅 [使用会话](/dotnet/framework/wcf/using-sessions)。For more information about sessions, see [Using Sessions](/dotnet/framework/wcf/using-sessions). 通常，此属性是通过使用 属性来设置的。Typically, this property is set using the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例通过引用应用程序配置文件中的 ，演示了 的典型用法。The following code example shows the typical use of the by referencing the in an application configuration file. 在这种情况下，对于一个到 的连接，指定的值一次最多只能建立一个消息处理。In this case, the values that are specified establish, at most, one message processing at one time from one connection to one . 实际的用法必须根据经验确定。Real-world usage must be determined through experience. [!code-xml[ServiceThrottlingBehavior#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/servicethrottlingbehavior/cs/hostapplication.exe.config#3)]
